descriptionHtml:
Skyrim Map is big and you will see that is true with this mod,who move borders to Morrowind.




This Mod open Border to Morrowind ,but only a small part of Morrowind.Beyond Skyrim of Dark Creations will come in year 2014.Until then i offer this mod.It is good not perfect but no crashes no viruses.
Add one new Vilage ahd new Stronghold.
Add Many new NPC as Bards,Guards,KraWarriors,Animals and other.
To Install Copy and Paste in data files,as other Mods.
There must be five files --- Open Border Riften.esp ,text file ,textures ,meshes,screenshots.
This Mod may to play With or Without official DLC Dawnguard ,Hearthfires and Dragonborn.
This Mod May to be in conflict with other Mods for Borders in this area.
I move border to the East,it still exist.No need to change ini file.I never see this before in other border mods.
All characters are not only NPC,they have their own life.They sleep ,eat,patrol and idle.


Version 03 open all borders of Skyrim to their limit,they still exist to prevent player to drop dawn.This version is preparation for my next Mod and for compability with Nyhus Mod.Add new NPC Thief,Mudcrabs , Skeevers,treasure chest ,plants.If play with Nyhus Mod near the Jerall Pass there is terain gapes,not my fall ,but this is a small problem and may be ignored...

To open the door of Stronghold you must obtain keys from three warlords.They patrol in different days and hours and they are trully hard to kill assassins...
